fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Transport Energy Social economy Financial services Digital Infrastructure Poverty Network industries
membership:
Athenora is member of the Public relations global network (PRGN, www.prgn.com) 
 
Athenora is member of SEAP (society of European affairs professionals, www.seap.be). 
 
Stéphane Desselas is Chair of the Groupe des nouveaux lobbyistes (http://www.nouveaux-lobbyistes.eu/).
goals__remit: Athenora Consulting is a consultancy firm specialised in EU lobbying. Our objectives:To provide relevant information on the EU to our clients.To give access to EU decision makers.To advise on how to communicate with the EU Institutions (position papers, press releases, open consultations, seminars...).To facilitate contacts with EU media, think tanks and the civil society.
